content.question: In the “RNA world” model for the origin of life, the first protocells (probionts) relied on RNA, not DNA, for information storage and transmission. Which of the following could best be considered evidence in support of the RNA world model?

choices.label: DNA is more stable than is RNA.
Some RNA molecules in contemporary cells have catalytic function.
RNA is so complex in both structure and function that it must have preceded DNA.
RNA has secondary structure whereas DNA does not.

content.answer: Some RNA molecules in contemporary cells have catalytic function.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
